decisions.description: If the Country isn't US or Canada it means we need to utilize the region free text field to store the Region instead of the dependent picklist. We're using a formula to do the check so that it can be easily changed in the event that we want to add more countries to the list of ones that use a pre-determined set of regions.
decisions.name: Country_not_US_or_Canada
decisions.label: Country US or Canada?

decisions.name: Did_User_Actually_Select_a_Result
decisions.label: Did User Actually Select a Result?

rules.name: No_they_did_not
rules.label: No, they did not - Machine Warranty

decisions.name: is_failed_part_filled_out
decisions.label: is failed part filled out?
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: No - there is no failed part number

decisions.name: Is_Name_line_1_not_null
decisions.label: has name line 1 been filled out?

decisions.description: If there is more than one we need to display an input for users to select, if it's just one we continue on our merry way. If it's 0 we tell the user it can't be found and to contact their admin.
decisions.name: Num_of_SN_s_Found

fields.name: Confirm_End_User_Account_Output1
fields.fieldText:
This machine is currently associated with the following customer:


Customer Name: {!varCustomerAccount.Name}

Customer Street: {!varCustomerAccount.BillingStreet}

Customer City: {!varCustomerAccount.BillingCity}


If this is correct, please simply click Next.


If this is not correct, please search on a customer below to update the Machine record.

fields.name: Current_Account_not_correct_create_new
fields.fieldText: Current customer is not correct but I could not find an existing customer record and would like to create a new one

fields.name: Confirm_End_User_Account_Output1_0
fields.fieldText:
The following Customer will be used to pre-fill location information: {!varCustomerAccount.Name}


If this is correct, please simply click Next.


If this is not correct, please search on a Customer below to use for location information.

fields.name: Above_Account_not_correct_create_new
fields.fieldText: The above customer is not correct but I could not find an existing customer record and would like to create a new one

fields.name: Screen2_Output1
fields.fieldText:
Package data (Required)


Model: {!SerialNumberRecordvar.Model_Number__c}

Serial: {!SerialNumberRecordvar.Name}

fields.name: Hours_in_Service_Package_Data
fields.fieldText: Hours in Service
fields.helpText: If your equipment doesn't have an hour meter, the estimated value is required.

fields.name: Screen2_Output2
fields.fieldText: Startup date: {!SerialNumberRecordvar.Start_up_Date__c}

fields.name: Air_End_Output
fields.fieldText:
Please download and complete the Air End Critical Information Checklist.


The form can be found at the below link:


Air End Critical Information Checklist


Once complete please scan and upload on the next screen.

fields.name: Cooler_Output1
fields.fieldText:
Please download and complete the BM-60, Compressor Cooler Failure Report.


The form can be found at the below link:


BM-60, Compressor Cooler Failure Report


Once complete please scan and upload on the next screen.

fields.name: VF_Drive_Output1
fields.fieldText:
Please download the below form to provide the following information:


  • Allen-Bradley case number
  • Failed Drive catalog number
  • Failed Drive manufactured date
  • Failed Drive serial number


The form can be found at the below link:


Variable Speed Drives PDF Form


Once complete please scan and upload on the next screen.

fields.name: Starter_Output1
fields.fieldText:
Please download and complete the Champion Compressor Service Check List.


The form can be found at the below link:


Champion Compressor Service Check List


Once complete please scan and upload on the next screen.

fields.name: Motor_CM_Output1
fields.fieldText:
Please download and follow the instructions on the following form.


The form can be found at the below link:


Requirements for Claims on Electric Motors


On the next screen please upload the following:


  • EASA Motor inspection report
  • Failed Motor nameplate, if replaced.

fields.name: Motor_CP_Output1
fields.fieldText:
Please review the following document:


Requirements for Claims on Electric Motors - Champion



Once finished, download and complete the Champion Compressor Service Check List.


The form can be found at the below link:


Champion Compressor Service Check List


Once complete please scan and upload on the next screen along with the following other documents:


  • EASA Motor inspection report
  • Failed Motor nameplate, if replaced

fields.name: Champion_Pump_Output1
fields.fieldText:
Please download the below form to provide the following information:


  • Serial number of failed Pump
  • Serial number of replacement Pump, if applicable


The form can be found at the below link:


Processing Claims for Pumps PDF


Once complete please scan and upload on the next screen.

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7)

value.stringValue: Please note the current date and time. To resume the Warranty Claim, please click the "Claims in Progress" tab and look for a tile with a title of "Warranty Claim Form" which has a "Time Paused" that matches the date/time you paused. If you provided a pause reason it will be displayed as well.
